questions.question: An inclined plane is an example of:

choices.answer: A simple machine
A complex machine
An effort machine
A time-saving machine
Bumper cars
Rollercoaster
Teacups
Carousel

questions.question: On what amusement park ride might you see an inclined plane?

choices.answer: It reduces the amount of work one needs to do
It increases the amount of work one needs to do
It makes work require more effort
It makes work require less effort

questions.question: Which of the following is a true statement about an inclined planes?

choices.answer: The effort exerted over a certain amount of time
The force required to make an object accelerate
The effort exerted over a certain distance
The force required to make a moving object stop
The 100-meter dash
Swimming
Ice skating
Downhill skiing

questions.question: Which Olympic event features an inclined plane?

choices.answer: Walking up a short ramp with a steep incline
Walking up a long ramp with a steep incline
Walking up a long ramp with a slight incline
Bypassing the ramp and jumping directly onto a platform

questions.question: Which of these activities would require the least effort?

choices.answer: The amount of work you have to do increases slightly
The amount of work you have to do decreases slightly
The amount of work you have to do decreases significantly
The amount of work you have to do stays the same

questions.question: When you carry a heavy box up a ramp, instead of lifting it directly onto a platform:
Which of the following devices makes use of an inclined plane?

choices.answer: A can
A funnel
A bottle
A bucket

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of an inclined plane you might find in your house?

choices.answer: The doorknob on your bedroom door
The bed that you sleep in
The blades of a fan used to cool your room
The wheels on your desk chair
Another word for "ramp"
Another word for "flat surface"
Another word for "machine"
Another word for "gravity"
